IllegalArabicValueException - Exception in it.matjaz.numerus
Checked exception thrown to indicate that the arabic Integer values to to be converted into roman numerals is out of range of possible roman numbers' values.

it.matjaz.numerus - package it.matjaz.numerus
This package contains the core classes and method of Numerus that allow conversion and manipulation of roman numerals.

R

RomanCharMapFactory - Class in it.matjaz.numerus
Factory generating structures of pairs (roman character, its integer value) to be used in RomanConverter.
RomanConverter - Class in it.matjaz.numerus
Offers conversion methods from roman numerals as Strings to arabic numerals as Integers and vice-versa.

Constructs the converter by preparing its reference for translating roman character into numeric values and vice-versa.

A container for syntactically correct roman numerals saved as strings.

RomanRepl - Class in it.matjaz.numerus
Simple command line REPL shell for conversions from and to roman numerals.
RomanRepl() - Constructor for class it.matjaz.numerus.RomanRepl
Constructs a Numerus REPL, a shell in which the numbers could be converted and some other commands can be called.
